content.question: Is the bird gaining weight faster when it weighs 40 grams or when it weighs 70 grams? Explain your reasoning.

frqParts.text: Is the bird gaining weight faster when it weighs 40 grams or when it weighs 70 grams? Explain your reasoning.

topic.text: 4.3: Rates of Change in Applied Contexts Other Than Motion

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
